description_for_human: 输入症状，获取穴位按摩建议和位置图片。帮助你快速找到正确的穴位进行自我保健。
description_for_model: This plugin helps users find acupressure points based on their symptoms. When a user describes pain or discomfort (like headache, back pain, insomnia, anxiety, nausea), use this plugin to get recommended acupoints with location images. Always call the chat endpoint with the user's symptom description to get personalized recommendations.
